title: OMM 10 : Q&A Part II
dc:creator: Team Tham
description:
Natalie and Vikki continue to address some fantastic questions from the OMM community in todays episode. The girls explore OMM practices for helping kids with video game obsessions, how to take the will power affect out of emotional eating, along with highlighting the value of delaying gratification. We also discover how just one mindful breath Listen In

The post OMM 10 : Q&A Part II appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
content:encoded:
Natalie and Vikki continue to address some fantastic questions from the OMM community in todays episode. The girls explore OMM practices for helping kids with video game obsessions, how to take the will power affect out of emotional eating, along with highlighting the value of delaying gratification. We also discover how just one mindful breath can change our whole day. Some amazing OMM tools here today.

The post OMM 10 : Q&A Part II appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
